title: Executive Assistant for Airbnb Operations & Admin Support (Full-Time, Remote)
salary: Month 1: $700 + performance bonus  Month 2: $750 + performance bonus  Month 3 onwards: $800+ performance bonus (based on results and growth)
job_overview:
???? Hours Per Week: To be Determined
? Work Window: Must be available between 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM Pacific Time
(Note: You won’t work the full 12 hours, but should be reachable and respond within 5 minutes during this window.)

???? We’re Hiring!
Are you someone who thrives in a dynamic, fast-paced environment? Do you have a strong eye for detail, love keeping things organized, and enjoy supporting others behind the scenes? We’re looking for a proactive and reliable Executive Assistant to join our growing Airbnb operations team!

This is a remote, full-time opportunity to work with a driven team that manages short-term rentals across platforms like Airbnb, VRBO, and Upgrade to see actual info. You’ll play a critical role in ensuring smooth day-to-day operations and delivering an exceptional guest experience.

???? Key Responsibilities:
Handle guest messages and bookings across multiple platforms

Update and maintain Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs)

Track key metrics (occupancy, revenue, reviews, etc.)

Schedule and coordinate contractors and property maintenance

Respond to guest-related calls quickly and professionally

Assist with administrative tasks: scheduling, email and inbox management, data entry, and reporting

Ensure our Airbnb operations are efficient, organized, and stress-free

???? Bonus Skills (Not Required, but a Plus!):
Experience with GoHighLevel CRM or similar platforms

Familiarity with email marketing tools (e.g., Mailchimp, ActiveCampaign)

Background in Airbnb, vacation rentals, or the hospitality industry

Excellent English communication skills (spoken and written)

Detail-oriented and systems-driven

???? How to Apply (IMPORTANT!)
To be considered, please submit a short video (max 3 minutes):
? Introduce yourself
? Share your experience
? Tell us why you’d be a great fit for this role

???? Upload your video to YouTube (unlisted), Google Drive, Loom, or another shareable platform and include the link in your application.

???? Applications without a video will not be considered.

We’re excited to meet someone who takes initiative, communicates well, and truly wants to grow with us. If that sounds like you—apply today!
